EmailTemplate.name: PD-2015-08-SaaS Program.EMAIL-End Of Service Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: [Important] VMTurbo SaaS Early Access Expiration
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=VMTurbo SaaS User}}, Thank you for participating the VMTurbo SaaS Early Access program. We are in the process of improving the service and will be shutting down your instance on Friday, May 20th 2016. If you are still interested in using VMTurbo SaaS for your Hyper-V or OpenStack environment or can spare some time to give us feedback please respond back to this note. Thanks, Ben Yemini VMTurbo Product Marketing
